categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Attack on an Imperial Impound Yard

An attack was led by members of the Rebel Alliance at an Imperial Impound Yard on Novka. The objective of the attack, led by Leia Organa, Luke Skywalker, Han Solo and Tula Markona of Clan Markona, was to retrieve the Volt Cobra, the starship of Sana Starros.
